attributes.action: seek an Audience with the Queen to dissolve this corrupt Parliament and call an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No matter how many MPs pay back the money they have mistakenly claimed, the honour of this Parliament is forever stained and it is no longer fit to represent the people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
